dcterms:creator: M. H. Albadi
E. F. El-Saadany
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides insights into demand response mechanisms in electricity markets, focusing on localized load reduction strategies.
dcterms:title: Localized Load Reduction Market (LLRM)

dcterms:creator: J. A. Michline Rupa
S. Ganesh
dcterms:description: A test feeder dataset used for power flow analysis in radial distribution systems, specifically the IEEE 33-node configuration.
dcterms:title: IEEE 33-node test feeder

dcterms:description: Historical data of customers used to assess participation and load reduction capabilities in the localized load reduction market.
dcterms:title: Historical data of customers

dcterms:description: Data representing the costs incurred by consumers for load curtailment, which is essential for evaluating the economic aspects of demand response.
dcterms:title: Consumers’ load curtailment costs

dcterms:description: Data on consumer bids for participation in the localized load reduction market, which is crucial for market operations and optimization.
dcterms:title: Consumers’ bids for participation in LLMR
